entry.title: Pdftk Tips and Commands
entry.content:
Often I need to manipulate in some way PDF files. On Windows, the best tool is Adobe Acrobat. But there is one downside: it costs way too much! Pdftk is a wonderful command line tool that lets you manipulate PDF files. It is free and you can install it even on Windows.

Here are some useful commands that I use:

```

buil a PDF out of different PDF files

Syntax is: Astartpage-endpage

justb:~/pdftk â‡’ pdftk A=file1.pdf B=file2.pdf C=file3.pdf cat A1 B1 A3 C1 A5-end output output.pdf ```
